column4: so I just burned my self a lubuntu live CD and am tring it out but I tried the disk check and it said it had one defect but it still is running fine so far in the live CD what do you guys think
Do you think I should just try to install with the disk or make a new one
in *my* humble opinion, you should probably make a new disk with no defects...i think it'd be asking for trouble otherwise
yeah your right why mess something up from the start
